Reviews.Title: Fuji makes a fine camera!
Reviews.Author: Susan Royce
Reviews.Content: This is my second Fuji camera and I love it!  It takes clear, sharp pictures and is really easy to use.  The video feature captures wonderful footage with very little shake and decent audio.  For a "point and shoot" camera this is excellent value for the money!

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Christine A. Riley "wildnsyko"
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd Fuji Finepix I have owned.  I've never had any problems with any of them and the pictures are great.  I compared this one to a Sony at the same price, and the Fuji won me over.  The Fuji now has the image stabilization which helps as I get older and cannot hold the camera as steady as I used to.  Great little camera for the amateur or professional.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Gregg Perez "Goyo"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Fuji digital.  My first one had a view finder.  This one does not.  I dont think anyone should buy a camera that doesnt have a view finder in my opinion.  You just cant see the lcd screen in bright sunny conditions.  I love Fuji picture quality.  I like the size and the familiar functions.  I just dont like that it doesnt have a viewfinder.  No matter what brand I buy next, it will have a view finder.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam!
Reviews.Author: StudentDoc
Reviews.Content: I did a thorough research before I bought this cammera.  For its price, I don't think you can ask for more.  However, the picture can be a little bit grainy when viewed in full size (I'm not sure if this is the case for other cameras as well). One more thing, I can't find a way to view the recorded videos on my computer yet. I can transfer the videos from the SD card to my hard drive but can't view it.  I can only hear the sound.Edit 8/1/07: I am able to view the videos with Quicktime player. :)

Reviews.Title: Professional quality photos in a snap!
Reviews.Author: W. Bills "Book lover"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for about two years.  It has been on many trips without missing a beat.  I took my daughters to the park to take photos for a Father's Day project, & the photos turned at just as good as a professional photographer we had used for senior pix.  They were stunning!  The pictures were sharp & clean, the colors were bright, vibrant, & true.  We even had a couple of the pictures enlarged to 8x10 size & they were still just beautiful.The camera is easy to use.  It has the versatility to take video as well & the footage was very good & the sound really surprised me at how clear it was!  I didn't expect it to be very good, so I was pleasantly surprised.The manual is also a plus.  The instructions are clear & easy to understand.  You don't have to be a professional to understand the directions.I would recommend this camera to friends & family.

Reviews.Title: Overated
Reviews.Author: Stephen L. Whetstone "Photo Man"
Reviews.Content: Pros -- Easy to use -- entry level cameraCons -- Photo Print quality larger than 4 x 6 is very poor, lots of noise, colors do not seem natural.  I would suggest that you spend a little extra money and buy the Nikon P-3 or P-4.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Terry Bakewell
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. I wanted something small to carry to car shows, etc. It is small, easy to use, nice LCD and it takes great pictures.I also purchased two more for my daughter and granddaughter. They both love it!

Reviews.Title: OK......
Reviews.Author: kev6677 "TECHNO JUNKIE"
Reviews.Content: PICTURE QUALITY IS GOOD WITH A FLASH FOR EVENING OR LOW LIGHT SHOTS THE IMAGE QUALITY IS NOT THAT GREAT THOUGH.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mr. James F. Bish
Reviews.Content: I have a Toshiba 1.3 megpic I bought in 1998 and I bought a Fuji 4.1 for my wife last year and I can appreciate this camera, It's simple to use and it takes good pictures. I know if your Little Mr. I have Big bucks you can buy something better. But It all lays in read the instructions and apply your experiece and be patient....Burma Shave

ProductInfo.Features:
8-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
3x optical zoom; 2.5-inch LCD display
Icon-based graphic user interface (GUI)
14 flexible scene modes
Stores images on xD Picture Cards or SD memory cards (includes 10MB internal memory); powered by AA-size batteries (2 alkaline batteries included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix A800 8MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom
